title: InfoTrends' Matt Swain to Moderate Xplor Panel at GRAPH EXPO
text:
Matt Swain, Director for InfoTrends’ Transactional Communications & Payments and Document Outsourcing Services, will be moderating Xplor’s breakfast keynote session during GRAPH EXPO.
Weymouth, MA
Matt Swain , Director for InfoTrends’ Transactional Communications & Payments and Document Outsourcing Services , will be moderating Xplor’s breakfast keynote session during GRAPH EXPO. The panel will take place September 15th from 8:30 – 10:00 am at McCormick Place North, room N426a in Chicago, IL.
Mr. Swain will open the session with a presentation on the topic of The Emergence of Omni-Channel Communications followed by a panel discussion, which he will moderate. Swain will be joined by Dan Beery, Doc Composition Manager of RR Donnelley, Marianne Gaige, President/CEO of Cathedral Corporation, and Mark Laube, COO of Microdynamics Group.
Communicating via multiple channels often still falls short of a true omni-channel approach. As marketers and transactional communication stakeholders begin to leverage a single view of their customers (and prospects) more strategically, the customer experience becomes an interaction with a brand—not a channel within the brand. “Communications channels and preferences have evolved,” noted Swain. “I’m excited to discuss the topic of omni-channel communications with a panel with such deep market insights.”
Consumers want to engage with a brand at their retail store, online, via mobile app, through their hardcopy bill, direct mail piece, catalog or social media via a seamless customer interaction, independent of channel or device. “We’re thrilled to have Matt return to moderate our breakfast keynote session this year,” exclaimed Skip Henk, President and CEO of Xplor. “Our sponsors have recommended superb speakers to join Matt and we can’t wait to see it all come together on Tuesday.”
Registration for Xplor’s breakfast keynote is complimentary; however, space is limited to the first 200 registrants. Each attendee will also receive a complimentary Graph Expo Exhibit Hall pass as part of their registration. For more information, or to register, please visit the Xplor at Graph Expo registration site here .
About Xplor International
Xplor International, also known as Xplor® and The Electronic Document Systems Association®, was incorporated in 1981 as a not-for-profit association. Xplor’s global network of regions and chapters are directed, organized, and governed by its members and represents thousands of professionals around the world. For more information, visit http://www.xplor.org .
About InfoTrends
InfoTrends is the leading worldwide market research and strategic consulting firm for the imaging, document solutions, production print, and digital media industries. We provide insights and advice to help clients understand market trends, identify opportunities, and grow their business. Additional information about InfoTrends is available on the Web at http://www.infotrends.com .
